notes: Second-generation Pacifica minivan, facelifted for 2021 model year. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Pacifica (minivan) article, October 13, 2025 revision.

Second-generation Pacifica minivan, plug-in hybrid variant, facelifted for 2021 model year. 16 kWh lithium-ion battery with 33 miles electric range. Not available with AWD, 8-passenger seating, or Stow 'n Go. Difficulty modifier 1.4 due to high-voltage EV components. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Pacifica (minivan) article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Rebadged, lower-trim version of the Chrysler Pacifica. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Voyager article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Rebadged, lower-trim version of the Chrysler Pacifica, sold in Canada. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Grand Caravan article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Second generation Chrysler 300. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler 300 article, October 13, 2025 revision.
